title: Solr join scoring
description:
Add queryTimeJoining to solr.

Example:

q=
{!join  from=docId to=fileId}
pageTxt:test-123


No scoring on the result just a list of documents that have a match.

comments.author: David vandendriessche
comments.content:
As stated here:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LUCENE-4043?focusedCommentId=13557151&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-13557151
